title: Avoid logging `http: TLS handshake error ... remote error: tls: unknown certificate`

labels.name: enhancement
labels.description: New features or improvements of some kind, as opposed to a problem (bug)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
We don't particularly care whether the browser likes our certificate or not, and at least with my Chrome, with the certificate properly accepted and the GUI working, it still spams for every poll;

```
2019/05/21 14:07:34 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49156: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:07:34 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49157: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:07:34 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49158: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:07:44 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49159: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:07:44 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49160: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:07:54 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49161: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:07:54 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49162: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:07:54 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49163: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:08:04 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49164: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:08:04 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49165: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:08:04 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49166: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:08:14 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49168: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:08:14 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49169: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:08:14 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49170: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:08:24 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49172: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:08:24 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49173: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
2019/05/21 14:08:24 http: TLS handshake error from [::1]:49174: remote error: tls: unknown certificate
and so on and so forth
```
